item.title: Musk Backs Call for US to Leave NATO, UN
item.description: Elon Musk supported calls for the United States to withdraw from NATO and the United Nations.

item.title: Lutnick: Trump to Set Levels of Mexico, Canada Tariffs
item.description: The U.S. will impose tariffs on Canada and Mexico Tuesday, but the situation is "fluid" and President Donald Trump will determine the levels, said Com...

item.title: Rep. John James: US Manufacturing Exploited for 'Decades'
item.description: Rep. John James, R-Mich., took issue Sunday with the international trade practices he said have been used to exploit Americans for "decades."

item.title: Rep. Mike Turner: Zelenskyy Turned Win Into Heated Debate
